name: One Night at Blue Man's
description:
WARNING!!!

One night at Blue Mans contains: Loud noises, flashing lights and lots of jumpscares!

STORY:

A Restaurant called "Blue Man show" is being made across the street from a local Su Tart's and McDonald's. The owner of Blue Man (who will be revealed later) asks the manager of The Su Tart's if he can hold on to the Blue Man Robot while the building is being worked on. But, that night, The Robot becomes active and has effects going on with some employees at Su Tart's, and someone at McDonald's. It's a bad day to be a nightguard. Try to survive One Night At Blue Mans. #fnaf #horror #fangame #survival
